description: Striker Andrija Novakovich signs a new two-year contract at Reading and joins Dutch club Telstar on a season-long loan.
title: Andrija Novakovich: Reading striker extends contract and joins Telstar on loan
title_page: Andrija Novakovich: Reading striker extends contract and joins Telstar on loan - BBC Sport
